backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a mini market POS system with customer management, inventory, sales tracking, cash register sessions, raffle eligibility logic, user profiles, and authorization/storage mixins. Supports three payment methods: pix, debito, and credito.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that converts old sales data with payment methods (cash, card) to new payment methods (pix, debito, credito) by defaulting all old sales to pix during upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features: fixing payment method mapping in mappers.ts, updating sales report grouping logic, and adding payment method confirmation display in CheckoutPanel.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/TSX files covering domain types, state management, UI components, POS flow, customer management, inventory, cash register, and reporting features with Portuguese localization.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements including sidebar, charts, and semantic tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Mini Market Manager React application with basic meta tags and root div mounting point.
frontend/PERFORMANCE_IMPROVEMENTS_REPORT: Performance optimization report detailing authentication system implementation with Internet Identity, render optimizations using useCallback/useMemo across pages, and elimination of unauthorized backend calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that manages page navigation, authentication state, and renders the header, footer, and current page (dashboard, inventory, POS, customers, cash register, or sales history).
frontend/src/backend/mappers.ts: Provides mapping utilities to convert between frontend domain models and backend types, including currency conversion (BRL to cents), payment methods, sale items, customers, sales, and cash register sessions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication wrapper component that shows a loading screen during initialization, login page if unauthenticated, or renders children if authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Loading screen component displayed while the authentication system initializes, showing a shopping bag icon and spinner.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/CashC: Panel component for closing a cash register session, displaying initial float, sales breakdown by payment method, grand total, and a close button.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/CashO: Panel component for opening a new cash register session with an input field for the initial float amount.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/Closi: Displays a list of historical cash register closing records with timestamps, totals, and payment method breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/cashregister/repor: Utility functions for calculating payment method breakdowns (credit, debit, PIX) from sales data and filtering sales by session.
frontend/src/features/customers/Customer: Customer detail view showing customer info, total purchases, raffle eligibility status, and purchase history with items and payment methods.
Dialog component for creating or editing a customer with name and phone fields, including form validation and loading states.
Table component displaying a list of customers with view, edit, and delete action buttons for each row.
frontend/src/features/inventory/ProductF: Filter controls for products with a search input by name and a category dropdown selector.
Dialog form for creating or editing products with fields for name, category, price, stock, and image upload with base64 conversion.
frontend/src/features/inventory/ProductT: Memoized table component displaying products with images, details, low-stock badges, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/features/pos/CartPanel.tsx: Shopping cart display showing line items with quantity controls, remove buttons, and total calculation.
frontend/src/features/pos/cartTypes.ts: Defines CartItem type and utility functions for calculating line subtotals, cart totals, and converting cart items to sale items.
Checkout interface with payment method selection (PIX, Debit, Credit) and a complete sale button with processing state.
frontend/src/features/pos/CustomerSelect: React component for selecting a customer in POS, supporting search/filter with debouncing, pagination (50 items at a time), and options for 'Final Consumer' or specific customer selection.
frontend/src/features/pos/draftSaleStora: Manages localStorage persistence of draft POS sales (customer, cart items) with 24-hour expiration to prevent data loss on page refresh.
frontend/src/features/pos/payment.ts: Defines payment methods (PIX, Debit, Credit), validates cash payments, and calculates change with i18n support.
React component for browsing and selecting products in POS with search, category filtering, pagination (12 items), and stock/availability indicators; disabled until customer is selected.
frontend/src/features/pos/RaffleEligibil: Displays a trophy alert when sale total exceeds R$50.00 threshold to indicate raffle eligibility.
frontend/src/features/pos/useCart.ts: React hook managing cart state with add/update/remove operations, stock validation, error handling, and total calculation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches backend actor instances based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppStore.ts: Zustand store managing global app state (products, customers, sales, cash sessions) with CRUD operations and localStorage persistence; includes backend-driven setters for syncing with canister data.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthenticatedActor: Compositional hook combining Internet Identity authentication with actor initialization, returning null when unauthenticated and providing readiness flags to prevent anonymous backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces rapidly changing values with configurable delay (default 300ms) using setTimeout cleanup pattern.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for all backend operations (customers, sales, cash register) with data mapping between frontend and backend types, including CRUD operations and query invalidation.
frontend/src/i18n/ptBR.ts: Portuguese (Brazil) localization strings for the entire application, including navigation, forms, validation messages, and category/payment method labels.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors, focus states, and smooth transitions using a professional high-contrast color scheme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CashRegisterPage.tsx: Cash register management page with panels for opening/closing sessions and viewing closing history, syncing backend state to local store and calculating session totals from sales.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Customer management page with list/detail views, search filtering, and CRUD operations using backend queries, including customer detail navigation and debounced search.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page that displays navigation cards for inventory, POS, customers, cash register, and sales history modules with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Inventory management page with product listing, search/filter by category, and CRUD operations using ProductTable, ProductFilters, and ProductFormDialog components.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PosPage.tsx: Point-of-sale page with product picker, cart management, customer selection, checkout flow, and draft sale persistence using local storage and backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/SalesHistoryPage.tsx: Sales history page displaying collapsible sale records with customer info, items, payment details, and admin-only delete functionality.
frontend/src/storage/localStorageStore.t: LocalStorage persistence layer for app state (products, customers, sales, cash sessions) with versioning and migration support.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: TypeScript domain model definitions for Product, Customer, Sale, SaleItem, CashSession, CashCloseRecord, and AppState.
frontend/src/utils/image.ts: Image processing utility that resizes, compresses, and converts images to base64 with size limits (500KB) for storage optimization.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Currency formatting and parsing utilities for Brazilian Real (BRL) using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a multi-tenant POS system with Internet Identity isolation, documenting a known payment method classification bug where Pix and Debit sales are incorrectly saved as Credit, and listing pending feature requests to fix this issue.
